get.summary: Get list of all users in database

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Initialize a user to the database with the users information.

201.description: Details of the new initialized user

get.summary: Retrieve a user

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Update users call status if ONLIVESTREAM / ONCALL / ONCHAT or ONLINE.

path.description: path of the value to change ie status

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Add a new user to the database with the users information.

role.description: Role of the user - { ASTROLOGER or USER }

201.description: Details of the new initialized user

get.summary: Retrieve a users order information by timestamp

parameters.name: startTs
parameters.description: starting ts to get order from

parameters.name: endTs
parameters.description: end timestamp till where to get order

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: the key from which to get the left orders from, used for pagination

get.summary: Retrieve a users order information by a host by timestamp

parameters.name: startTs
parameters.description: starting ts to get order from

parameters.name: endTs
parameters.description: end timestamp till where to get order

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: the key from which to get the left orders from, used for pagination

post.summary: ONLY FOR TESTING PURPOSE, initialize a new order

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Add a new order to the database for the user.

dateTimeOfBirth.description: date of time of the user

placeOfBirth.description: place of birth of the user

get.summary: Get list of all active channels

200.description: List of all the active channels and their details.

post.summary: Start a new channel with particular channelType

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
Initialize channel with: 
   channelId = hostId
 - host   = details of host starting the channel
 - if any channel exists
 - delete the current channel and initialize a new

channelId.description: identifier to uniquely determine single livestream

uid.description: identifier of the host for agora

201.description: Details of the newly created channel.

get.summary: Get latest active users channel

200.description: Details of the livestream with channelId = params.channelId.

op.description: operation in the patch ie REPLACE

200.description: Details of the channel thats stopped.

post.summary: Send an event to a channel/livestream joined -> Gift or Message

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Send only message if sending a message or send giftId if sending a gift

userId.description: Identifier of the user sending the event

message.description: The message to send to the livestream

get.summary: Get waitlist of a channel

200.description: Waitlist of the channel with channelId = params.channelId.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Update waitlist of a channel using new users information

uid.description: identifier of the host for agora

200.description: Updated Waitlist of the channel with channelId = params.channelId.

delete.summary: Remove a user from waitlist of a channel

200.description: Updated Waitlist of the channel with channelId = params.channelId.

get.summary: Get temporary host of a Channel

post.summary: Add a temphost to a channel

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description:
channelId of channel
 - users callStatus cannot be ONCALL
 - users callStatus should be ONLINE

uid.description: agora identifer of the temporary host

patch.summary: Update temporary hosts status in a channel

value.description:
status value
[ACCEPTED, REJECTED, TERMINATED_BY_(ASTROLOGER, USER, SYSTEM)]

get.summary: Generate RTC token for client

expertise.description: expertises of the host ( as an array of expertises )

experience.description: years of experience of the host

get.summary: Get Chat ID(s) by User Id(s)
get.description: Query single userId for list of chats of the user.\n  	Query multiple userids for chatId of the particular session of users.

parameters.name: users
parameters.description:
Require single userid - userid.
 Require user ids seperated by commas
   ie - userId1, userId2

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
Initialize a chat session between one or multiple users
   require role for identifying the host of the chat

post.summary: Initialize a new chat session for users

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
Initialize a chat session between one or multiple users
   require role for identifying the host of the chat

get.summary: Get session details like chatlist and call data
get.description: Gets latest unreceived messages from chat which are active

200.description: List of chats and call data

patch.summary: Modify users lastRead and lastReceived message timestamp for chat

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: identifier of the user for modifying lastReceived or lastRead

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Update waitlist of a livestream using new users information

get.summary: Get list of chats starting by a timestamp or latest 50 chats

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description:
timestamp for retrieving list of chats.
needs to be in epoch miliseconds

parameters.name: key
parameters.description:
key for the last chat rendered in the 50 chats.
needs to be in epoch miliseconds

200.description: list of chats and their details

post.summary: Send a new message in chat

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
Send a new message in chat
 - cannot send the message having same timestamp and user
 - retrieves all the messages after the lastReceived

lastReceived.description: retrieve all the messages after lastReceived

ts.description: timestamp of the new message sent

message.description: actual message data, cannot be more than 1024 words

type.description:
the type of the new message
text, image or video.

201.description: list of chats and their details

patch.summary: Edit a message in chat by its timestamp

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: timestamp of the particular message to be edited

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: - identifier of the user for modifying lastReceived or lastRead

value.description:
new message
cannot be more than 1024 bytes/words

200.description: list of chats and their details

post.summary: Send a mail to an email

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Send the mailData to the email.

mailData.description: mail data to send to the particular email

post.summary: Start an order for userId for amount

get.summary: Get Payment history by userId based on timestamp and last key
get.description: Require userId, startTs, endTs and key.\n  	"key" is used for timestamp of the last order

parameters.name: startTs
parameters.description: timestamp from where to get the orders

parameters.name: endTs
parameters.description: timestamp till where to get the orders

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: the key of the last received orders timestamp for querying next.
